question: The Central government launched biodegradable sanitary napkins under the name 'Suvidha', priced at
explanation: The Central government launched biodegradable sanitary napkins under the name 'Suvidha', priced at Rs.2.50 per pad, which will be available at Pradhan Mantri Bhartiya Janaushadhi Pariyojana (PMBJP) Kendras. The sanitary napkins will be available in a pack of four pads for Rs. 10 across over 3,200 PMBJP Kendras by May 28, 2018.
